ARABIC: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and Thamud and the people of Lut and the Companions of the Thicket.* Those too were Confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied. These were the hordes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and so did Thamud and the people of Lot and the people of Aykah. These were all leagued together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: So also did the people of Thamud, Lot, and the dwellers of the Forest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the tribe of Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the People of the Woods; these are the groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the Dwellers of Al-Aykah; such were the Confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Samood and the people of Lut and the dwellers of the thicket; these were the parties.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the men of the Thicket - those were the parties;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (the tribe of) Thamud, and the folk of Lot, and the dwellers in the wood: these were the factions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the tribe of Thamud, and the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the Wood -- these were the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the dwellers of the wood; these were the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Thamud, and the people of Lot, and the inhabitants of Aykah: those were the factions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the Companions of the Wood; - such were the Confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Thamud, and the people of Lout (Lot), and the dwellers of the wood; such were the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thamood, the nation of Lot and the dwellers of the Thicket such were the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the Woods—these were the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:13] and Thamūd and the people of Lot and the dwellers in the wood, a small forest, namely, the people of Shu‘ayb, peace be upon him — those were the factions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (the tribe of) Thamud) the folk of Salih denied Salih; (and the folk of Lot) denied Lot, (and the dwellers in the wood) the folk of Shu'ayb also denied Shu'ayb: (these were the factions) these were the disbelievers. 521
